review: Easy install.  Streaming to my HDTV through the Fire TV is great.  I have not explored all that I can do, yet I have found/downloaded  Pandora, Netflix, Flixter, and others.  These few apps have really enhanced my family room entertainment.  I also found one FREE really fun racing game app that I have played just about everyday.  I have Prime at this time, so I can see many Movies, TV, etc for free.  I have seen that without Prime, you lose many free access to TV, Movie, etc.  Now it is deciding on balancing between, Netflix, Prime, Hulu Plus, etc (all about $7-9 per month each).  Over-all, I am very happy with the Fire TV.
